==Notes==
{{Movement skill notes|notBeforeRokkr=1}}
* It is possible for smite to move an ally over mountains, forests, ponds, trenches but not walls or [[Structures]].
* If another unit is already occupying the destination area or the destination area is [[terrain]] that the ally cannot normally occupy, Smite will push the ally one space instead.
